holidays.name: Star Wars Day
holidays.description: Celebrate all things Star Wars with the pun-inspired greeting, 'May the 4th be with you!' A day for fans to honor the legendary sci-fi saga created by George Lucas.
holidays.origin: The phrase 'May the 4th be with you' is a pun on the famous line 'May the Force be with you' from the Star Wars films. It gained popularity among fans in the early 2000s and has since become an unofficial global holiday.
holidays.funFact: Since 2011, Lucasfilm has officially acknowledged May 4 as Star Wars Day, hosting fan events and special releases worldwide.

holidays.name: National Candied Orange Peel Day
holidays.description: A sweet and tangy day dedicated to enjoying candied orange peels — a citrusy treat that's both zesty and sugary!
holidays.origin: Candied orange peel is a confection that dates back centuries, originally made as a way to preserve fruit. This quirky food holiday celebrates this delicious traditional treat.
holidays.funFact: Candied orange peel is often dipped in chocolate for an extra decadent twist, making it a luxurious snack during holidays.

holidays.name: National Firefighter's Day
holidays.description: A day to honor firefighters for their bravery, dedication, and service keeping communities safe from fire hazards and emergencies.
holidays.origin: While not an official federal holiday, many recognize May 4 to appreciate firefighters' hard work and sacrifices, with various local events and fundraisers supporting fire departments.
holidays.funFact: The buddy system firefighters use, where partners look out for each other during dangerous operations, is a critical safety protocol developed over many decades.

holidays.name: International Star Wars Day Meme Day
holidays.description: A niche, internet-driven holiday where fans share hilarious Star Wars-themed memes, jokes, and creative fan art celebrating the galaxy far, far away in a humorous way.
holidays.origin: With the rise of meme culture and Star Wars fandom intersecting heavily online, this informal day emerged to combine laughter and fandom on May 4.
holidays.funFact: Some of the most viral Star Wars memes—from Yoda’s peculiar grammar to Darth Vader’s parenting struggles—come to life especially on this day.
